content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: $ta_element
      operator: is_not_unique_relationship
      value: $ta_epoch
    - name: ELEMENT
      operator: contains
      value: $ta_epoch
Operations:
  - domain: TA
    id: $ta_element
    name: ELEMENT
    operator: distinct
  - domain: TA
    id: $ta_epoch
    name: EPOCH
    operator: distinct
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0323
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: When ELEMENT is associated with more than 1 EPOCH, ELEMENT should not
  refer to a specific EPOCH.
Outcome:
  Message: ELEMENT refers to a specific EPOCH when ELEMENT is associated with more
    than 1 EPOCH
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0323
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: TESTRL should be expressed without referring to Epoch.
                  If the Element appears in more than one Epoch in the Trial Arms
                  dataset, then the Element description (ELEMENT) must not refer to
                  any Epochs.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Assumption 9
                Section: 7.2.2
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TA
      - TE

json.Description: When ELEMENT is associated with more than 1 EPOCH, ELEMENT should not refer to a specific EPOCH.

Outcome.Message: ELEMENT refers to a specific EPOCH when ELEMENT is associated with more than 1 EPOCH

Citations.Cited_Guidance: TESTRL should be expressed without referring to Epoch. If the Element appears in more than one Epoch in the Trial Arms dataset, then the Element description (ELEMENT) must not refer to any Epochs.
